channel.title: Template on dai_re
channel.description: Recent content in Template on dai_re

item.title: 3 simple navbar Template
item.description:
In accordance with what I said some time ago on social media, this time I will provide 3 simple and responsive navigation bar templates to complement the website or blog that you are creating.

There are 2 ways to use this template, you can download all the files (html, css, js) in my github repository or directly copy the code from this article.

the method

  • download
  • copy

navigation view

1 first

2 second

3 third

download all files

Open this link https://github.com/dai-re/3-navbar-templates

Click code after that click download ZIP

Or you can also use the terminal by

1

git clone https://github.com/dai-re/3-navbar-templates

copy the code

first style

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=Edge">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css">
  <title>nav style 1</title>
</head>

<body>

  <!-- NAV STYLE1 -->
  <div class="nav_body">
    <div class="nav_box">
      <div class="logo">MYLO<span style="color: #fff">GO</span></div>
      <div class="hamburger" id="hamburger">
        <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-menu-2" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="2" stroke="currentColor" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
          <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none" />
          <line x1="4" y1="6" x2="20" y2="6" />
          <line x1="4" y1="12" x2="20" y2="12" />
          <line x1="4" y1="18" x2="20" y2="18" />
        </svg>
      </div>
      <div class="menu" id="menu">
        <ul>
          <li><a href="">menu1</a></li>
          <li><a href="">menu2</a></li>
          <li><a href="">menu3</a></li>
          <li><a href="">menu4</a></li>
          <li><a href="">Main Btn</a></li>
        </ul>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
  <!-- NAV STYLE1 -->


  <script src="main.js"></script>
</body>

</html>

* {
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
}

:root {
  --logo: #C51212;
  --bg: rgba(48, 49, 59, 1);
}

.nav_body {
  width: 100%;
  background: var(--bg);
  padding: 8px 0px;
  position: relative;

}

.nav_box {
  margin: auto;
  color: #fff;
  width: 85%;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
}

.nav_box .logo {
  font-weight: 900;
  font-size: 20px;
  letter-spacing: 4px;
  color: var(--logo);
}

.menu {
  margin-top: -25em;
  position: absolute;
  right: 2px;
  transition-duration: 1s;
  z-index: 3;
  opacity: 0;

}

.menu ul {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  width: 150px;
  padding: 8px;
  align-items: center;
  background: var(--bg);
  border-radius: 5px;
  gap: 10px;
}

.menu-active {
  margin-top: 13em;
  opacity: 1;

}

.menu ul li {
  list-style: none;
}

.menu ul li:active {
  color: var(--logo);
}

.menu ul li:nth-child(5) {
  color: #fff;
  font-weight: 500;
  background: var(--logo);
  padding: 5px 8px;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

.menu ul li:nth-child(5):hover {
  background: #7A1717;
}

.menu ul li a {
  color: unset;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.hamburger {
  position: absolute;
  right: 10px;
  z-index: 5;

}

@media only screen and (min-width: 480px) {
  .nav_body {
    width: 100%;
    background: var(--bg);
    padding: 10px;
  }

  .nav_box {
    margin: auto;
    color: #fff;
    width: 85%;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
  }

  .nav_box .logo {
    font-weight: 900;
    font-size: 20px;
    letter-spacing: 4px;
    color: var(--logo);
  }

  .menu {
    margin-top: 0;
    position: relative;
    right: 2px;
    z-index: 6;
    opacity: 1;

  }

  .menu ul {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: row;
    right: 2px;
    width: auto;
    padding: 0;
    align-items: center;
    background: unset;
    border-radius: 0;
    gap: 10px;
  }

  .menu ul li {
    list-style: none;
  }

  .menu ul li:active {
    color: var(--logo);
  }

  .menu ul li:nth-child(5) {
    color: #fff;
    font-weight: 500;
    background: var(--logo);
    padding: 5px 8px;
    border-radius: 5px;
  }

  .menu ul li:nth-child(5):hover {
    background: #7A1717;
  }

  .menu ul li a {
    color: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
  }

  .hamburger {
    display: none;
  }
}

javascript

1
2
3
4
5
6

let hamburger = document.getElementById('hamburger')
let menus = document.getElementById('menu')

hamburger.onclick = function(){
  menus.classList.toggle('menu-active')
}

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css">
  <title>nav style 2</title>
</head>

<body>
  <div class="nav_body">
    <div class="nav_box">
      <div class="logo">
        <span>
          LOGO
        </span>
      </div>
      <div class="search">
        <input class="in" type="text" name="" id="" placeholder="Search">
        <div class="btn_input">
          <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-search" width="15" height="15" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="2" stroke="#fff" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
            <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none" />
            <circle cx="10" cy="10" r="7" />
            <line x1="21" y1="21" x2="15" y2="15" />
          </svg>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</body>

</html>

*{
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
}
body{
  background: #fff;
}
.nav_body{
  background: #fff;
  box-shadow: 0px 2px 3px  rgba(149, 149, 149, 0.5);
  padding: 8px 0px;
}
.nav_box{
  display: flex;
  padding: 0px 10px;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
}
.logo span{
  font-weight: 800;
}
.search{
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
}
.search .in{
  border: none;
  background: rgba(192, 192, 192, 0.4);
  padding: 5px;
  border-radius: 5px;
  margin-right: 5px;
  font-weight: bold;
}
.btn_input{
  background: #4BC85E;
  width: 20px;
  padding: 3px;
  text-align: center;
  border-radius: 5px;
}
.btn_input svg{
  margin-bottom: -2px;
}

<body>

  <!-- NAV STYLE1 -->
  <div class="nav_body">
    <div class="nav_box">
      <div class="logo">MYLO<span style="color: #fff">GO</span></div>
      <div class="hamburger" id="hamburger">
        <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-menu-2" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="2" stroke="currentColor" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
          <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none" />
          <line x1="4" y1="6" x2="20" y2="6" />
          <line x1="4" y1="12" x2="20" y2="12" />
          <line x1="4" y1="18" x2="20" y2="18" />
        </svg>
      </div>
      <div class="menu" id="menu">
        <ul>
          <li><a href="">menu1</a></li>
          <li><a href="">menu2</a></li>
          <li><a href="">menu3</a></li>
          <li><a href="">menu4</a></li>
          <li><a href="">Main Btn</a></li>
        </ul>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
  <!-- NAV STYLE1 -->


  <script src="main.js"></script>
</body>

</html>

* {
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
}

:root {
  --logo: #C51212;
  --bg: rgba(48, 49, 59, 1);
}

.nav_body {
  width: 100%;
  background: var(--bg);
  padding: 8px 0px;
  position: relative;

}

.nav_box {
  margin: auto;
  color: #fff;
  width: 85%;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
}

.nav_box .logo {
  font-weight: 900;
  font-size: 20px;
  letter-spacing: 4px;
  color: var(--logo);
}

.menu {
  margin-top: -25em;
  position: absolute;
  right: 2px;
  transition-duration: 1s;
  z-index: 3;
  opacity: 0;

}

.menu ul {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  width: 150px;
  padding: 8px;
  align-items: center;
  background: var(--bg);
  border-radius: 5px;
  gap: 10px;
}

.menu-active {
  margin-top: 13em;
  opacity: 1;

}

.menu ul li {
  list-style: none;
}

.menu ul li:active {
  color: var(--logo);
}

.menu ul li:nth-child(5) {
  color: #fff;
  font-weight: 500;
  background: var(--logo);
  padding: 5px 8px;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

.menu ul li:nth-child(5):hover {
  background: #7A1717;
}

.menu ul li a {
  color: unset;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.hamburger {
  position: absolute;
  right: 10px;
  z-index: 5;

}

@media only screen and (min-width: 480px) {
  .nav_body {
    width: 100%;
    background: var(--bg);
    padding: 10px;
  }

  .nav_box {
    margin: auto;
    color: #fff;
    width: 85%;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
  }

  .nav_box .logo {
    font-weight: 900;
    font-size: 20px;
    letter-spacing: 4px;
    color: var(--logo);
  }

  .menu {
    margin-top: 0;
    position: relative;
    right: 2px;
    z-index: 6;
    opacity: 1;

  }

  .menu ul {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: row;
    right: 2px;
    width: auto;
    padding: 0;
    align-items: center;
    background: unset;
    border-radius: 0;
    gap: 10px;
  }

  .menu ul li {
    list-style: none;
  }

  .menu ul li:active {
    color: var(--logo);
  }

  .menu ul li:nth-child(5) {
    color: #fff;
    font-weight: 500;
    background: var(--logo);
    padding: 5px 8px;
    border-radius: 5px;
  }

  .menu ul li:nth-child(5):hover {
    background: #7A1717;
  }

  .menu ul li a {
    color: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
  }

  .hamburger {
    display: none;
  }
}
